general.title: open book society e.V
general.header: We are the open book society e.V., an association dedicated to supporting, promoting, and disseminating contemporary design of publications and forms of independent publishing as well as the discourse of critical book aesthetics. We organize the It's a book and the WTP award. We are open to all and invite everyone interested to join.
